titles: If it plese ony man spirituel or temporel to bye ony pyes of two and thre comemoracio[n]s of saliburi vse ...
author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
Church of England. Book of common prayer. Ordinal.
notes: Advertisement by William Caxton for: Ordinale seu pica secundum usum Sarum (STC 16228).
Reproduction of the originals in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Rites and ceremonies --  Early works to 1800.
